home.title: Grow your knowledge with Bacsystem
home.description: We are a team of passionate developers creating code solutions, designed to optimize learning and productivity in each project.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn about our history, mission, and how we can help you create customizable technology solutions.
about.subject: Introduction
about.reference: We are passionate about developing quality software. Our mission is to offer practical, educational and business solutions that help people and organizations learn, grow and launch their own technological projects.

item1.label: Mission
item1.description: Our Mission facilitate access to software projects ready to implement, promoting learning and innovation.

item2.label: Vision
item2.description: To be the leading platform to acquire customizable code solutions in Peru

item4.label: Teams
item4.description: We are developers with experience in technologies such as Java, Golang, SpringBoot, Angular and much more.
